mapper.insert: insert into user (id, password, name, email, address, birth, point, job, married) values (#{id}, #{password}, #{name}, #{email}, #{address}, #{birth}, #{point}, #{job}, #{married})
mapper.update: update user set password=#{password}, name=#{name}, email=#{email}, address=#{address}, birth=#{birth}, point=#{point}, job=#{job}, married=#{married} where id=#{id};
